message: I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.  It's a fair deal, considering I'm the one making the offer!

Alice, I think we can do better than your previous offer. Let's split it more evenly. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  Consider that if you reject this, the money will be worth less in the next round.
Bob, I'm willing to compromise a bit. Let's split it 60/40.  Remember, if you reject, we both lose out due to inflation.  This is a good deal for both of us.
